extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by any of the CVEs by retrieving the installed version of BIG-IP Next Central Manager, BIG-IP, or NGINX Plus.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which CVE is the system affected by?

extracted_playbook.title: Update BIG-IP Next Central Manager
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest update to BIG-IP Next Central Manager to mitigate CVE-2024-39809.

extracted_playbook.title: Update BIG-IP (all modules)
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest update to BIG-IP (all modules) to mitigate CVE-2024-39778.

extracted_playbook.title: Update NGINX Plus
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest update to NGINX Plus to mitigate CVE-2024-39792.

extracted_playbook.title: Update BIG-IP (all modules)
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest update to BIG-IP (all modules) to mitigate CVE-2024-41727.

affected_products: BIG-IP (all modules) versions 17.1.0, 16.1.0 through 16.1.4, and 15.1.0 through 15.1.10
NGINX Plus versions R30 through R32
